description: Main package providing MMS client interface for IEC 61850 protocol

fields.name: logger
fields.description: Logger for debugging (always initialized with default logger, can be replaced via WithLogger option)

methods.name: Initiate
methods.description: Establishes COTP connection, sends MMS Initiate Request with customizable options and receives response

functions.name: NewMmsClient
functions.description: Creates new MMS client with default logger (can be replaced via WithLogger option)

functions.name: WithLogger
functions.description: Sets custom logger for MmsClient (replaces default logger)
